Campus Tours
Campus tours are offered every hour and a half on Wednesdays, Fridays, and every second Saturday. Find more information about Registration.


Virtual Application Advising Appointments for Fall 2023 Applicants
Register for a one-on-one session with a Student Outreach & Recruitment Counselor to help you successfully complete your Fall 2023 application. Learn more.
